page.title: 05Maresfield Village
page.content: {Maresfield}is a small residential village. It is between Uckfield and Nutley.The A22 goes through Maresfield and the A272 crosses the A22.There is a round_about at the cross road.There is a{school}on the A22.Next to the school there is a{garage}.In the village is another{garage}and a{tyre {centre .The recreation ground}is near the{church}and{cemetery.}There is a {Post Office}and a{news agents},an {antiques shop,the Cabin Cafe and a pub called the{Chequers},and an{estate agents.There is a small housing estate originally council houses and one big housing estate in the park.There is a {village hall}and a developing{leisure {centre}with no swimming pool which is part ofthe old army camp and also a {fire station.}In the village is a {builders yard}and a{china {gallery}.Maresfield was{Marysfield.
